description:
This is a fun prank application. This application allows you to make your Touchpad appear as having a broken screen. This app resides as a WebOS app and can be tapped in any time from card view or launcher.
It does not change your wallpaper and does not take any resources when idle.
Use it to pull a fast one on your girlfriend/ boyfriend/ spouse/ kids (Oh look you broke it!)
or as an excuse not to lend your Touchpad to someone (Sorry, the screen is broken).
You can choose from a set of ultra realistic 10 broken screen designs. 
(Slide/ Flick image left/ right to choose different broken screen design.)
The app is designed to be completely full-screen so no status bars are shown for a completely realistic broken Touchpad look. The other apps are still accessible with usual navigation.
Please note: the preview image screenshots shown here are altered in quality compared with originals included in the app.
